a short set at Room 5 this Monday

By Krister Axel on 08/27 2010 at 06_29 in Historical

I'm finally playing a live set for the first time in a long time. I have some new songs I want to try out.

I'll be at Room 5 on Monday sharing a bill with some great friends of mine. Mike Freas and Trevor Menear are going to tear it up in the 8:00 hour. around 9 or 9:30 I'll play a few songs and then, Joel Eckels, Chris Pierce, Gaby Moreno and Paulie Cerra are in the round to finish up.

Krister Axel
Room 5 Lounge in Amalfi Restaurant
Monday August 30th at 9pm
143 N LaBrea Ave link
